SYSTEM: Linked_Games_research_presentation.pdf: Página 7
Games Industry in numbers - US
• 58% of Americans play video games
• Average gamer age is 30
• 32% under 18 years
• 32% 18-35
• 36% over 35 years
• 55% male 45% female
• U.S Computer & Video Game sales
in dollars: 14.8 billion USD
